item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Given the references to penguins, blowing up, and the netherworld, most likely a Disgaea/Prinnies reference, d00d.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Jadian was the 2nd of the 4 new that my village summoned. Like I mentioned under Fayt, these were implemented back when we were only about halfway through the summon list, and we just summoned Fayt the morning that the drops/upgrades were updated with their stats. So far they seem to be getting summoned alphabetically.

Difficulty: 11
Defeat: You kick the penguins out, and claim the dessert!
